tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Evacuees (
  evacuee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  evacuee_name VARCHAR(50),
  contact_number VARCHAR(15),
  current_location VARCHAR(100),
  destination_shelter VARCHAR(100),
  evacuation_status BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE evacuees (
  evacuee_id serial PRIMARY KEY,
  evacuee_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  evacuation_location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  destination_shelter VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  evacuation_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE transportation (
  transport_id serial PRIMARY KEY,
  vehicle_number VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
  driver_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  start_location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  end_location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  estimated_arrival_time TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE shelters (
    shelter_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location VARCHAR(100),
    capacity INT,
    contact_person VARCHAR(50),
    contact_number VARCHAR(15)
);

CREATE TABLE transportation (
    transport_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_type VARCHAR(50),
    license_plate_number VARCHAR(15),
    driver_name VARCHAR(50),
    available_seats INT,
    departure_time TIMESTAMP,
    arrival_time TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE evacuees (
  evacuee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR,
  age INT,
  contact_number VARCHAR,
  evacuation_point VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE shelters (
  shelter_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location VARCHAR,
  capacity INT,
  contact_number VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE transportation (
  vehicle_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  type VARCHAR,
  capacity INT,
  driver_name VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE movements (
  movement_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  evacuee_id INT,
  shelter_id INT,
  vehicle_id INT,
  movement_time TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE evacuees (
   evacuee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
   contact_number VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
   current_location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
   destination_shelter VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE tracking_history (
   tracking_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   evacuee_id INT NOT NULL,
   timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
   location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
   status TEXT NOT NULL,
   FOREIGN KEY (evacuee_id) REFERENCES evacuees(evacuee_id)
);
